data.name: TOCOViX Demo
data.short_description: Place Crosses on the game board and complete Shapes. Earn Stops to block your opponents and make your way to victory! Play with your friends on the same device or challenge other players Online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 or greater
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 Drivers
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS® High Sierra or greater
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 Drivers
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
